overview_of_class: This course is the third part in a three-quarter sequence designed to introduce students to Polish language and culture. We continue to learn the basic grammar of Polish, focusing on speaking, reading, writing, and listening.
name: Introduction to Polish
title: WCAS SLAVIC 108-3-1 Introduction to Polish

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is the third part in a three-quarter sequence designed to introduce students to Polish language and culture. We continue to learn the basic grammar of Polish, focusing on speaking, reading, writing, and listening.

subject: SLAVIC
